fields.value: Massachusetts Archives Collection. v.239-Revolution Resolves, 1783. SC1/series 45X, Petition of Jeremiah Pearson

dsDescriptionValue.value:
Petition subject: Property

Original: http://nrs.harvard.edu/urn-3:FHCL:13909144

Date of creation: 17830000

Petition location: Newburyport

Legislator, committee, or address that the petition was sent to: Several names from a committee

Selected signatures:

  1. Jeremiah Pearson

Total signatures: 1

Legal voter signatures (males not identified as non-legal): 1

Female only signatures: No

Identifications of signatories: gentleman

Prayer format was printed vs. manuscript: Manuscript

Additional archivist notes: Joel Weed, Samuel Moody, Samuel Noyes, Essex, American Army, soldier, veteran, military service, manumission, freedom, house land, Sarah Weed, trespasser, John Hale, [additional documents in volumes, see pages 251-254]

Location of the petition at the Massachusetts Archives of the Commonwealth: Massachusetts Archives volume 239, pages 258-259
